item.title: 'Genius' full movie: Watch full movie online
item.description: Whatever chances the sweet-faced, spontaneous Utkarsh had of making a career in Bollywood is jinxed by his dadâ€™s ancient filmmaking. ‘Genius’ movie review: This star-kid debut is let down by old-fashioned filmmaking Utkarsh Sharma and Ishita Chauhan in ‘Genius’.
